name: MOL Hungarian Oil and Gas Company
goal:
MOL Group is an integrated, international oil and gas company, headquartered in Budapest, Hungary.
It is active in over 30 countries with a dynamic international workforce of over 25,000 people and a track record of more than 100 years in the industry.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Internal Market, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: All files related to energy, climate, environment, taxation, transport, competition, company law.
